data.lyric:
[ti:Way Less Sad]
[ar:AJR]

[00:00.00]Way Less Sad - AJR
[00:02.72]词：Ryan Met/Jack Met/Adam Met/Paul Simon
[00:05.44]曲：Ryan Me/Jack Met/Adam Met/Paul Simon
[00:08.16]Hey Hey Hey
[00:09.78]Hey Hey Hey
[00:11.65]Hey Hey Hey
[00:15.09]Hey Hey Hey
[00:16.68]Hey Hey Hey
[00:18.21]Hey Hey Hey
[00:21.44]I should move because New Yorks is getting muddier
[00:24.91]There's LA but it's always kinda sunnier
[00:27.81]And I don't wanna hide no morn
[00:31.08]So I set my bar real low
[00:35.61]I'm a-okay I'm a-okay
[00:38.93]You say it but you just don't mean it
[00:42.47]You're so insane you're so insane
[00:45.82]Shut up and just enjoy this feeling
[00:48.66]Don't you love it? Don't you love it?
[00:50.52]No I ain't happy yet
[00:53.30]But I'm way less sad
[00:55.62]Don't you love it? Don't you love it?
[00:57.38]No I ain't happy yet
[01:00.03]But I'm way less sad
[01:03.08]Hey Hey Hey
[01:04.71]Hey Hey Hey
[01:06.34]Hey Hey Hey
[01:07.09]But I'm way less sad
[01:09.54]Hey Hey Hey
[01:11.52]Hey Hey Hey
[01:13.25]Hey Hey Hey
[01:13.87]But I'm way less sad
[01:16.52]I wake up and I'm not so mad at Twitter now
[01:19.89]Livin' sucks but it's suckin' just a little now
[01:22.68]And I don't wanna cry no more
[01:25.94]So I set my bar real low
[01:30.43]I'm a-okay I'm a-okay
[01:33.76]You say it but you just don't mean it
[01:37.29]You're so insane you're so insane
[01:40.65]Shut up and just enjoy this feeling
[01:43.57]Don't you love it? Don't you love it?
[01:45.40]No I ain't happy yet
[01:48.27]But I'm way less sad
[01:50.48]Don't you love it? Don't you love it?
[01:52.21]No I ain't happy yet happy yet
[01:54.94]But I'm way less sad
[01:57.93]I may be wrong I may be wrong
[02:01.26]It's too good but it's all I have
[02:04.11]Don't you love it? Don't you love it?
[02:05.94]No I ain't happy yet
[02:08.80]But I'm way less sad
[02:17.29]Well I can't fall asleep and I'm losing my mind
[02:20.74]'Cause it's half past three and my brain's no fire
[02:24.65]I've been counting sheep but the sheep all died
[02:27.54]And I'm trying too hard but I can't not try
[02:30.86]Well I can't fall asleep and I'm losing my mind
[02:34.41]'Cause it's half past three and my brain's no fire
[02:38.26]I've been counting sheep but the sheep all died
[02:41.24]And I'm not dead yet so I guess I'll be alright
[02:45.43]Don't you love it? Don't you love it?
[02:47.10]No I ain't happy yet happy yet
[02:49.96]But I'm way less sad
[02:52.10]Don't you love it? Don't you love it?
[02:53.97]No I ain't happy yet
[02:56.86]But I'm way less sad
[02:59.66]I may be wrong I may be wrong
[03:01.20]I may be wrong I may be wrong
[03:02.97]It's too good but it's all I have
[03:05.87]Don't you love it? Don't you love it?
[03:07.75]No I ain't happy yet
[03:10.63]But I'm way less sad
data.trans:
[ti:Way Less Sad]
[ar:AJR]
[al:Way Less Sad]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.72]//
[00:05.44]//
[00:08.16]//
[00:09.78]//
[00:11.65]//
[00:15.09]//
[00:16.68]//
[00:18.21]//
[00:21.44]我应该搬家 因为纽约越来越难熬
[00:24.91]洛杉矶还行 不过总是出大太阳
[00:27.81]我不想再躲藏
[00:31.08]所以我把标准降得很低
[00:35.61]我很好 我没事
[00:38.93]你这样说 但你并不好
[00:42.47]你好疯狂 你没理智
[00:45.82]闭上嘴巴 享受这种感觉
[00:48.66]你不喜欢吗 你不爱吗
[00:50.52]不 我还是不开心
[00:53.30]但悲伤的情绪好多了
[00:55.62]你不喜欢吗 你不爱吗
[00:57.38]不 我还是不开心
[01:00.03]但悲伤的情绪好多了

[01:11.52]//
[01:13.25]//
[01:13.87]但悲伤的情绪好多了
[01:16.52]我一觉醒来 感觉没有那么讨厌推特了
[01:19.89]日子很难过 但现在没那么难过了
[01:22.68]我不想再哭泣
[01:25.94]所以我把标准降得很低
[01:30.43]我很好 我没事
[01:33.76]你这样说 但你并不好
[01:37.29]你好疯狂 你没理智
[01:40.65]闭上嘴巴 享受这种感觉
[01:43.57]你不喜欢吗 你不爱吗
[01:45.40]不 我还是不开心
[01:48.27]但悲伤的情绪好多了
[01:50.48]你不喜欢吗 你不爱吗
[01:52.21]不 我还是不开心
[01:54.94]但悲伤的情绪好多了
[01:57.93]我可能错了 我可能不对
[02:01.26]这太好了 但这就是我的全部
[02:04.11]你不喜欢吗 你不爱吗
[02:05.94]不 我还是不开心
[02:08.80]但悲伤的情绪好多了
[02:17.29]我睡不着觉 我快要疯掉
[02:20.74]因为时间已经三点半 而我的脑袋一团乱
[02:24.65]我一直在数羊 但羊都死掉了
[02:27.54]我太拼命了 但我不能放弃
[02:30.86]我睡不着觉 我快要疯掉

[02:41.24]我还没有死 所以我应该会好起来
